articles.author: Christian Edwards
articles.title: Britain to rejoin EU’s Erasmus student exchange program in Brexit reversal - CNN
articles.description: Britain announced that it will rejoin the European Union’s Erasmus student exchange program in 2027, six years after it ditched the scheme during fractious Brexit negotiations.
articles.content:
Britain announced that it will rejoin the European Unions Erasmus student exchange program in 2027, six years after it ditched the scheme during fractious Brexit negotiations.
